On Dec 14, 2007, at 3:39 PM, mike amundsen wrote:

> If I want to support PUT/POST to a resource URL in more than one media
> type (application/atom+xml, application/rss+xml) what is the best way
> to communicate that to clients?

Docs. Maybe not best, but easiest.

When the client learns of the existence of your service, make the  
information available then.

When you send a 415 to your client, point them to the information in  
the error message in the body of the 415 response.

Leave to humans what humans do best (learn), and leave to computers  
what computers do best (dreary, boring automatable stuff).
